interestingFact: Japan is known as the 'Land of the Rising Sun' and has over 6,800 islands.
Brazil is the only country in South America that speaks Portuguese.
Canada has the longest coastline of any country in the world.
Australia is home to more kangaroos than people.
India is the world's largest democracy by population.
France is the most visited country in the world.
South Africa has three capital cities: Pretoria, Bloemfontein, and Cape Town.
Italy is home to the largest number of UNESCO World Heritage Sites.
